info.title: Homebrew Loader
info.author: SudoTronics
info.description: Launch homebrew from the config menu
info.details: An Aroma plugin for launching homebrew from the config menu. It scans sd:/wiiu/apps recursively to discover both .wuhb and .rpx titles. (Depending on the amount of homebrew on the SD card, It can take a while for the config menu to load)\n\nNavigate with the D-Pad, press A to launch homebrew, and use Y to favorite, this appears as its own menu entry for rapid access and X to remove from favorites (Closing and reopening the config menu is required for the config menu to update favorites list)
